channel.title: OpenSSH on 📕W.'s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in OpenSSH on 📕W.'s Blog

item.title: OpenSSH 9.3p1编译安装,链接OpenSSL 1.1.1t静态库
item.description: 1. 软件版本： OS: Anolis OS release 8.8 SSH: openssh-9.3p1.tar.gz SSL: openssl-1.1.1t.tar.gz 2. 安装基础依赖包 dnf install -y gcc gcc-c++ make zlib zlib-devel pam pam-devel tar 3. 手动编译OpenSSL # 解压缩 tar zxf openssl-1.1.1t.tar.gz cd openssl-1.1.1t # 编译安装 ./config --prefix=/opt/openssl/ make && make install 安装目录结构 /opt/openssl/ ├── bin │ ├── c_rehash │ └── openssl ├── include │ └── openssl ├── lib │ ├── engines-1.1 │ ├── libcrypto.a │ ├── libcrypto.so -> libcrypto.so.1.1 │ ├── libcrypto.
